patterns_discovered.description: Routes are nested within a parent Layout route, automatically providing header/navigation/footer wrapper without explicit wrapping in each route element
patterns_discovered.evidence: Route placed inside <Route element={<Layout />}> parent in App.tsx
patterns_discovered.applies_to: All protected routes within the application

patterns_discovered.description: New features are scaffolded with minimal MUI components and placeholder text before implementation
patterns_discovered.evidence: AnalyticsDashboard uses Typography with 'coming soon' message

patterns_discovered.description: Pages are organized in subdirectories by feature (e.g., /pages/Analytics/) with component files inside
Third-party imports (MUI) followed by local component imports
patterns_discovered.evidence: App.tsx imports organized with external libraries first, then page components

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Route must be placed within Layout wrapper parent
gotchas_discovered.description: New routes need to be added as children of the Layout route element to inherit navigation/header styling, not as siblings
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Follow existing route structure when adding new routes

gotchas_discovered.description: Component uses default export which matches project convention but must be imported with correct syntax
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Verify import statement uses 'import ComponentName from ...' format for default exports

gotchas_discovered.description: Configuration files contain full absolute paths that need updating when switching between tasks/specs
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Auto-claude framework handles path updates automatically
